description:
With Jillas on the run, Lina`s party must go their separate ways in a twisting labyrinth. They encounter Almayce, Xellos, and Filia, and learn shocking insight into Valgaav`s intentions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Colère noire ! Poursuite dans le labyrinthe !
Selfless and Senseless! Pursuit Through the Labyrinth!
Без страха и без чувств! Погоня в лабиринте!
無我夢中! 迷宮の追跡行!
